description.content:
üëã Hello there! I'm your friendly Discord Bot, designed to assist you with expert knowledge and answers based on your uploaded documents. Whether you have technical queries, need insights on specific topics, or just want to explore new information, I'm here to help. Just upload your document, ask your question, and I'll do my best to provide you with a precise and informative response. Let's make learning and information gathering easy and fun!

If you have any questions or interesting things, feel free to share them with me. Come and start a great conversation!

example.name: Command Example
example.value:
Enter `/help` to get a list of commands
Enter `/description` to get the robot's self-introduction

upload.description: Upload a document to the bot

channel.description: Enable/Disable the bot in the current channel.
channel.button-above-message: Enable or disable the bot for this channel:

language.description: Set the language of the bot
language.placeholder: Select the language you wish to set

ask.success: The document scope you selected is:
ask.success2: The document scope has been set successfully, you can start asking questions now!
ask.message:
Please set the document scope you wish to use and ask your questions
To end the session just type /end
ask.end: The Q&A session has been closed

feedback.good_response: Thank you for your positive feedback, I will continue to work hard!
feedback.bad_response: Thank you for your feedback, I will work hard to improve!

ask-quick.description: Quickly ask the question you want to ask

ask-advanced.description: Advanced ask the question you want to ask

delete-uploaded-file.placeholder: Please select the file you wish to delete
delete-uploaded-file.message: Please select the file you wish to delete

download.placeholder: Please select the file you wish to download
download.message: Please select the file you wish to download

model-setting.button-above-message: Click the button below to switch the type of chat model

transfrom-file-scope.description: `Private messages only` Convert the specified file to shared / private
transfrom-file-scope.placeholder: Please select the file you wish to convert
transfrom-file-scope.message: Please select the file you wish to convert

administrator.description: `Private messages only` Set the administrator list
administrator.add-message: Please enter the user ID you want to add as an administrator:
administrator.add-timeout: Too long without response, administrator addition cancelled
administrator.already-admin: This user is already an administrator

permission.dm-not-allowed: This command is not allowed in DMs
permission.dm-or-enabled-channel-only: This command is only allowed in DMs or enabled channels
permission.dm-only: This command is only allowed in DMs
permission.admin-only: This command is only allowed for administrators
